title: The Advantages of Blockchain Technology for Startups
summary: Bitcoin is a decentralized, trustless technology that allows businesses to transfer assets without the need for a third-party. Startups can use blockchain technology to store and secure data in a foolproof manner and streamline the supply chain processes to eradicate fraud. The technology uses a combination of strong cryptography and peer-to-peer networking that makes it nearly impossible to breach the data. Using blockchain technology, you can create a transparent supply chain that is difficult to tamper with. It can be used to facilitate collaboration between different organizations and individuals.
